pageContext.claim: “No president has ever done what I've done. I mean, here we are with a ship contract today, as an example, that -- a yard that, frankly, would've been closed. It was, I think, either closed or would have been closed very shortly. Now they have a long-term, magnificent -- they built a great product. And this is a gorgeous -- this is an incredible weapon and a -- just a fantastic ship.”
pageContext.analysis: The Wisconsin shipyard had 1,000 employees and was not going to close. The Trump administration awarded a $5.5 billion contract to build 10 Navy ships, which is estimated will add another 1,000 jobs.
